QuestData.Title: Infestation
QuestData.Description:
Those bugs are destroying our crops and attack any of us who get near them.
Would you exterminate some of those vile creatures?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Diseased Grubs and $2oa Overgrown Larva at Earthmother's Bounty.
QuestData.CompletionText: The drogbar have a mastery of the earth and creatures that dwell within it.
QuestData.RewardText: With fewer of those insects out there, I can tend to some of the crops.
